Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. title: Authors and Citation
text: Edvardsen. Author, maintainer. Arnfinn Hykkerud Steindal. Author. Stein-Kato Lindberg. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Edvardsen , Steindal , Lindberg S (2025). imongr: Handle Data mongts. R package version 2.8.3, https://github.com/mong/imongr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {imongr: I Handle the Data for mongts},   author = {Are Edvardsen and Arnfinn Hykkerud Steindal and Stein-Kato Lindberg},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 2.8.3},   url = {https://github.com/mong/imongr}, }

what: I Handle the Data for mongts
title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: Primarily tool update data used mongts application.

title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: can install released version imongr GitHub :

title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: easiest way develop imongr fire docker-compose.yml file: file consist seven different services: - three mariadb databases (prod port 3331, verify port 3332, qa port 3333) - Adminer, tool database management, port 8888 - RStudio port 8787 - Code-server (vscode) port 8080 - app, based hnskde/imongr:latest image, port 3838 Open localhost:8787 favorite browser login rstudio password. Go imongr folder, open imongr.Rproj, press Yes want open project ~/imongr?. Start coding. prefer vscode, can open localhost:8080 instead. Populate databases using Adminer, either imongr (Administrative verktøy - Adminer) port 8888 (password username/db/repository name). data can visualized using mongts app: data can seen localhost:3000/kvalitetsregistre/alle/sykehus/
code: docker-compose up export DB_PORT=3331 # or 3332 for the verify database yarn install && yarn dev # inside the mongts folder

what: Build docker image and run the container app locally
title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: Navigate browser localhost:3838/.
code: R CMD build . docker build -t hnskde/imongr:latest . docker compose up

what: Getting out of some dirty states
title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: environment variables changed want change back default: pool closed properly, instance cleaned testing database: Go Adminer port 8888, click db breadcrumb. Click Refresh next Database database table delete unwanted databases. Look Process list kill unwanted processes. Go RStudio port 8787 restart R (Ctrl-Shift-F10).

title: I Handle the Data for mongts
text: Please note ‘imongr’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Aggregate hospital data — aggregate
text: Aggregation indicators provided unit (hospital) organization levels hospital: health trust, regional health trust national.

title: Aggregate hospital data — aggregate
code: agg(df, org, ind, ind_noagg = character(), orgnr_name_map)  agg_dg(aggs, ind)  agg_from_level(df, org, ind, conf, from_level)  agg_residual(aggs, conf)  agg_udef(diff, conf)

title: Aggregate hospital data — aggregate
text: df Data frame org Data frame holding flat org table levels needed. May obtained get_flat_org(pool) ind Data frame holding indicator db table providing data indicator ind_noagg Character vector identifying indicator (ids) aggregated (used ). Default character() orgnr_name_map Data frame global mapping organization id name. Applied data used (aggregation). aggs Data frame (pre) aggregated data conf List configuration from_level Integer specifying level aggregate diff Data frame diff data

title: Aggregate hospital data — aggregate
text: Data frame raw, grouped aggregated form

title: Aggregate hospital data — aggregate
text: functions adapted qmongr/qmongrdata. However, nomenclature function arguments changed somewhat. Main source underlying data qmongr database tables used function names kept (org ind). data frames passed function denoted df. aggregate consists following variables: year year current record ind_id Indicator ID orgnr Organization ID context orgnr understood, e.g. caregiver,   patient residency count Number observations current record var Summarised indicator value, instance mean median unit_level Code providing level aggregation 'hospital',   'hf' (health trust), 'rhf' (regional health trust) 'national' unit_name Name organization unit

text: Data frame made values Aar Numeric 4 digit year ShNavn String hospital name ReshId String internal id hospital OrgNrShus Numeric 9 digit id hospital Variabel String variable name kvalIndID Numeric id quality indicator delivery_id Numeric id referencing delivery

what: Low level database functions for imongr — db
title: Low level database functions for imongr — db
text: Database metadata read config. one defined 'env' corresponding values fetched environmental variables IMONGR_DB_HOST, IMONGR_DB_NAME, IMONGR_DB_USER IMONGR_DB_PASS. undefined function providing connection handles exit error. function expects table names variable names data also defined configuration. Thus, functions can left unchanged data model altered long changes reflected configuration.

title: Low level database functions for imongr — db
code: make_pool(context = "prod")  drain_pool(pool)  insert_table(pool, table, df)  get_table(pool, table, sample = NA)  get_table_raw(pool, table, sample = NA)

title: Low level database functions for imongr — db
text: context Character string defining environment context. Must one c("prod", "verify", "qa"). Default value "prod". pool database connection pool object table string defining target database table df data frame containing data inserted database sample Numeric range 0 1 defining relative sub-sample size, e.g. sample = 0.1 approximately 10% observations returned. Default NA return data

title: Low level database functions for imongr — db
text: Database pool object, data frame status message

title: Low level database functions for imongr — db
text: Ordinary user interactions data functions, may built ontop ones. instance, functions must make sure consistency (e.g. foreign keys) database tables kept order.

Thus, functions can left unchanged data model altered long changes reflected configuration.

code: get_all_user_data(pool)  get_user_data(pool)  get_user_id(pool)  get_user_registries(pool)  get_user_registry_select(pool)  get_user_deliveries(pool)  get_registry_data(pool, registry)  get_indicators_registry(pool, indicator)  get_registry_ind(pool, registry)  get_registry_name(pool, registry, full_name = FALSE)  get_org_name(pool, orgnr)  get_hospitals(pool)  get_hfs(pool)  get_rhfs(pool)  get_flat_org(pool)  get_all_orgnr(pool, include_short_name = FALSE)  get_user(pool, sample = NA)  get_users(pool, valid = TRUE)  get_registry_indicators(pool, registry)  get_dg_indicators(pool, registry)  get_registry_medfield(pool, registry)  get_medfield_registry(pool, medfield)  get_registry_user(pool, registry)  get_user_registry(pool, user)  get_users_per_registry(pool)  get_aggdata_delivery(pool, indicator)  get_aggdata(pool, registry)  get_review_collaborators(pool, registry)  get_registry_projects(pool, registry, indicator)  get_project_hospitals(pool, project)  get_ind_agg_data(pool, ind_id)  get_ind_units(pool, ind_id)  get_ind_limits(pool, ind_id)

title: Retreiv data from imongr database — db_get
text: pool database connection pool object registry Integer defining registry id indicator Character vector indicator ids full_name Logical defining full names returned orgnr Integer id organization include_short_name Logical variable 'short_name' returned sample Integer range \[0, 1\] defining data set subsample size. Defaults NA case data returned valid Logical select valid user . TRUE default medfield Integer defining medfield id user Integer defining user id

title: Tools and whatever — misc
text:
vals numeric vector tolerance (small) positive floating point number used evaluate numeric can regarded whole number. Default depends running environment set .Machine$double.eps^0.5 df data frame ind data frame holding indicator data. newline String element defining line break formatting. Default
include_data_table Logical defining data table populated data . default TRUE prompt Logical prompt user input. Default TRUE

code: delete_indicator_data(pool, df)  delete_agg_data(pool, df)  insert_data_verify(pool, df, update = NA, affirm = NA)  insert_data_prod(   pool_verify,   pool_prod,   df,   registry_delivery_ids,   terms_version = NA )  insert_agg_data(pool, df)  update_aggdata_delivery(pool, indicator)  agg_all_data(pool)  clean_agg_data(pool)  create_imongr_user(pool, df)  update_registry_medfield(pool, registry_id, df)  update_registry_user(pool, registry_id, df)  update_registry_user_role(pool, user_id, registry_id, role)

title: Functions for data operations in imongr — ops
text: pool Database pool object df data frame new user data overwriting old user list update Character string format YYYY-MM-DD providing date data regarded updated. Default value NA. affirm Character string format YYYY-MM-DD providing date data regarded final. Default value NA. pool_verify database pool object pool_prod database pool object registry_delivery_ids Integer delivery ids terms_version Character string providing version stamp terms accepted data published. Default value NA normally apply uploads prior publishing. indicator Character vector indicator ids registry_id numeric id selected registry role string role stored

code: select_registry_ui(   pool,   conf,   input_id,   context,   current_reg = character(),   show_context = TRUE,   pool0 = NULL )  submit_ui(input_id, conf, pool, upload_file, registry, df, ind, context)  error_report_ui(pool, df, ind, upload_file, registry)  warning_report_ui(pool, df, upload_file, registry)  upload_sample_text_ui(pool, conf, upload_file, registry, indicators)  upload_sample_ui(df, upload_file, registry, sample_size, sample_type)  var_doc_ui(conf)  medfield_summary_text_ui(pool, conf, df)

title: Functions that provide server output — server_output
text: pool Database pool object conf List configuration input_id Character string shiny ui id context Character string user selected (db) context current_reg Character string defining previously selected registry show_context Logical stating context shown GUI. TRUE default. pool0 Alternative database pool object used intersect values returned. upload_file Character string file upload registry Character string defining registry df Data frame containing indicator data ind Data frame containing indicators indicators Character vector indicators sample_size Numeric sample size sample_type Character string sampling type

text: shiny ui objects provided shiny server function

title: Upload data to imongr — upload
text: Various functions used data uploaded imongr. checks regarding consistency goes

title: Upload data to imongr — upload
code: check_report(registry, df, ind, pool)  mail_check_report(pool, registry, mail_msg)  check_upload(registry, df, ind, pool)  check_missing_registry(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_mixing_ind(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_missing_var(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_invalid_var(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_invalid_context(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_invalid_org(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_invalid_ind(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_numeric_var(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_natural_var(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_overflow_var(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_numeric_denominator(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_natural_denominator(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_zero_denominator(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_duplicated_inds(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_values_exists(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_numeric_year(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  check_natural_year(registry, df, ind, conf, pool)  csv_to_df(path, sep = ",", dec, encoding = "UTF-8")  sample_df(df, skip = c(""), n, random = FALSE)  indicator_is_fraction(pool, df, conf, return_ind = FALSE, ind = NULL)  filter_fraction_indicator(pool, df, conf, ind)

title: Upload data to imongr — upload
text: registry Integer registry id df Data frame holding indicator data ind Data frame indicators pool Data base pool object mail_msg Character vector holding (part ) email body conf List configuration path Character path file sep Character filed sep dec Character decimal sep encoding Character encoding skip character vector defining data frame variables skip n Numeric sample size random Logical sample method return_ind Logical whether indicators returned. FALSE default

title: imongr 2.1.0
text: Konteiner kjører nå på Alpine-image ([#391] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/391)). Størrelsen redusert fra 1,5 GB til 300 MB. Vilkår lastes ned som HTML stedet pdf ([#385] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/385)) Tvangsinstallerer eldre versjon av bslib siden applikasjon feiler på siste versjon ([#381] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/381))

title: imongr 2.0.2
text: Ett par bug-fix testing av om data som skal sendes inn er OK. La check_duplicated_inds gå gjennom ved error ([#375] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/375)). Hvis sjekk krasjer pga feil dataene (manglende kolonne), vil ikke bruker få beskjed om hva som er feil. natural-funksjon: ikke krasj ved NULL men returner FALSE Sjekker om data inneholder NA eller tom streng year-sjekker: sjekk om numerisk og naturlige tall

title: imongr 2.0.1
text: Fremdriftslogg og feilhåndtering publisering og aggregering ([#356] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/356)). Fiks av bug indikatormenyen hvor “Oppdater verdi”-knapp ikke forsvant ([#365] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/365)). Sjekk data mot oppdatert indikatortabell fra verify istedenfor utdatert indikatortabell prod tilfelle type har endret seg ([#362] (https://github.com/mong/imongr/pull/362)).

title: imongr 2.0.0
text: Removed use level level_direction agg_data table (#326).

title: imongr 1.3.0
text: Legg til indikator UI (#338) Slettet ‘get_indicator’-funksjon (#346) reduser syklisk kompleksitet (#339) Forenkling av docker-compose med yaml-merge (#347) Cache docker-bygging github actions (#348) Update hnskde/imongr-base-r Docker tag v2 (#350) Bygg og dytt opp docker-image arm64 parallelt med amd64 (#349)

title: imongr 1.2.0
text: Aggreger indikator og dekningsgrad basert på kortnavn istedenfor orgnummer (#331) Åpne lenke til verify-side ny fane (#335) Behold data fra år som ikke finnes opplastingsdata (#314) La bruker oppdatere indikatorformat (#336) La bruker angi dekningsgradsindikator UI-en (#337) Printe locale til logg (tegnsetting osv.)

title: imongr 1.1.0
text: Removed quotation marks downloaded csv files (#291) Added option downloading aggregated data table (#295). publish tab now refreshes publish button tab selected (#290). duplicate delivery check removed (#229), replaced warning file delivered (#303). Fixed bug caused latest update date set incorrectly aggregated data (#229). Selected register kept selected user changes tab (#309).

title: imongr 1.1.0
text: test now use two additional test databases order simulate data flow verify database prod database (#229). Data now transferred verify prod iteratively according delivery ID (#229). new table ‘publish’ added databases, column added ‘delivery’ table foregin key ‘publish’ table primary key. row ‘delivery’ table now corresponds one upload, row ‘publish’ table one publishing verify prod (#229). Speed aggregation update delivery times given registyr (#322). Removed unused functions (#304). Added code-server (vscode) separate dev container (#305). Return failure github actions lintr returns warnings (#312).

title: imongr 1.0.3
text: Update imongr-base-r v1.5.3 v1.6.0 (#287)

title: imongr 1.0.2
text: Erstatt NA med tom tekst kort og lang beskrivelse som hentes fra db (#275). NULL ind-verdier ga NA indikator-fane-felt, og dermed aktiv “Oppdater tekst”-knapp.

title: imongr 1.0.1
text: Mulighet til å velge gult målnivå hvis grønn er NULL (#272)

title: imongr 1.0.0
text: aggregate data updating ind table (#258) longer calculate indicator level (#254) Remove choose encoding option (#262) Update relevant ind values publishing (#260) show Oppdater tekster button new text (#264) Extended indicator editor (#208) Added report brief summary status registries (#209)

title: imongr 1.0.0
text: Modularization shiny app (#244 #245) Allow 120 characters per line (#243) Expose db instances outside, can used API/mongts (#231) Mount local source code docker-compose (#239) Use Renovate instead dependabot Changed name main branch master main

title: imongr 0.28.4
text: Duplicate check incorporate indicator table data (extended next feature version) Relaxed natural number checks, now applied data true fraction indicators

title: imongr 0.28.3
text: Fixed encoding related issue downloading data (#197). Fixed minor issues (typos GUI texts default values) Fixed problem update indicator title descriptions (without updating data) including relevant indicator data checking possible duplicate upload
